Package app

Class Settings

java.lang.Object
app.ini.custom.CustomIIniConfig
app.Settings
All Implemented Interfaces:
IIniConfig, java.lang.Iterable<IIniSection> 
public class Settings
extends CustomIIniConfig
implements IIniConfig

Abstraction for program configuration values. The Settings class defines default values and can import values from the settings file. If the settings file is loaded default values are overridden.

Inherits from CustomIIniConfig class

  • Method Details

    • createDefaultSettingsFile

      public void createDefaultSettingsFile​(java.lang.String filePath) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates configuration file with default values. Beware it will truncate any existing file first!
      Parameters:
      filePath - the file-path for the configuration file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • loadSettingsFile

      public void loadSettingsFile​(java.io.File file) throws InvalidConfigFileFormatException, java.io.IOException
      Loads the configuration file and overrides any existing values with those from the configuration file.
      Parameters:
      file - the configuration file
      Throws:
      InvalidConfigFileFormatException
      java.io.IOException
